channel.title: Food on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Food on Greg Herlein

item.title: Foreign Cinema: My Favorite Restaurant in the World
item.description: A friend recently asked me about restaurants in San Francisco and was shocked I’d never written about Foreign Cinema. Honestly? I was shocked too. It’s my favorite restaurant in the world. Yes, the world. And I travel to London, Paris, Mexico City…
